stats_day_meter:
CREATE TABLE `stats_day_meter` (
  `id` bigint NOT NULL,
  `terminal_id` bigint DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '表计Id',
  `kwh` decimal(10,2) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '今日能耗',
  `floor_id` bigint DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '楼层Id',
  `month` int DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '月份',
  `loop_level` tinyint DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '回路等级',
  `day` int DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '天',
  `terminal_type` varchar(255) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '终端类型，如：插座、空调、照明',
  `create_time` datetime DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '创建时间',
  `cabinet_id` bigint DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '配电柜Id，保留字段',
  `stats_time` date DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '统计时间，只有date',
  `update_time` datetime DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '统计时间，也就是定时任务执行时间',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`) USING BTREE
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_general_ci COMMENT='按天统计每个仪表的用能'
stats_month_meter:
CREATE TABLE `stats_month_meter` (
  `id` bigint NOT NULL,
  `terminal_id` bigint DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '表计Id',
  `kwh` decimal(10,2) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '本月能耗',
  `floor_id` bigint DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '楼层Id',
  `month` int DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '月份',
  `year` int DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '年',
  `loop_level` tinyint DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '回路等级',
  `terminal_type` varchar(255) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '终端类型，如：插座、空调、照明',
  `cabinet_id` bigint DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '配电柜Id，保留字段',
  `create_time` datetime DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '创建时间',
  `update_time` datetime DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '统计时间，也就是定时任务执行时间',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`) USING BTREE
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_general_ci
tb_terminal:
CREATE TABLE `tb_terminal` (
  `id` bigint NOT NULL,
  `identification` varchar(50) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '设备唯一识别码',
  `name` varchar(50) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '名称',
  `alias` varchar(255) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '别名',
  `model` varchar(50) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '型号',
  `smart_manager_device_id` bigint DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '所属通信管理机',
  `loop_id` bigint DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '所属回路',
  `address` varchar(50) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '地址（通信）',
  `status` tinyint DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '设备状态 0-离线 1-在线',
  `report_time_update` datetime DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '设备最近上报日期',
  `create_user` bigint DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '创建人',
  `create_time` datetime DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '创建时间',
  `update_user` bigint DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '修改人',
  `update_time` datetime DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '修改时间',
  `del_flag` tinyint NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`) USING BTREE
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_general_ci COMMENT='终端设备信息表'
tb_building:
CREATE TABLE `tb_building` (
  `id` bigint NOT NULL,
  `number` varchar(50) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '楼宇编号',
  `floor_count` int DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '楼层数量',
  `park_id` bigint DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '所属园区',
  `area` double(10,2) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '面积，单位：平方米',
  `user_id` bigint DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '负责人',
  `create_user` bigint DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '创建人',
  `create_time` datetime DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '创建时间',
  `update_user` bigint DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '修改人',
  `update_time` datetime DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '修改时间',
  `del_flag` tinyint DEFAULT '0',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`) USING BTREE
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_general_ci COMMENT='楼宇信息表'
tb_floor:
CREATE TABLE `tb_floor` (
  `id` bigint NOT NULL,
  `floor_number` varchar(50) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '楼层',
  `building_id` bigint DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '所属楼宇',
  `create_user` bigint DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '创建者',
  `area` double(10,2) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '楼层面积，单位：平方米',
  `sort` int NOT NULL COMMENT '排序',
  `create_time` datetime DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '创建时间',
  `update_user` bigint DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '修改者',
  `update_time` datetime DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '修改时间',
  `del_flag` tinyint NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`) USING BTREE
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_general_ci COMMENT='楼层表'
tb_loop:
CREATE TABLE `tb_loop` (
  `id` bigint NOT NULL,
  `name` varchar(50) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci NOT NULL COMMENT '回路名称',
  `current_specification` varchar(50) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '电流规格',
  `level` tinyint DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '回路级别（字典）',
  `cabinet_id` bigint DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '所属配电箱',
  `load` varchar(50) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci DEFAULT '[]' COMMENT '负载（字典）',
  `create_user` bigint DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '创建人',
  `create_time` datetime DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '创建时间',
  `update_user` bigint DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '修改人',
  `update_time` datetime DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '修改时间',
  `del_flag` tinyint DEFAULT '0',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`) USING BTREE
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_general_ci COMMENT='回路信息表'
tb_park:
CREATE TABLE `tb_park` (
  `id` bigint NOT NULL,
  `name` varchar(50) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci NOT NULL COMMENT '园区名称',
  `company` varchar(50) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '所属单位',
  `city` varchar(50) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '城市',
  `area` varchar(50) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '区',
  `longitude` varchar(50) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '经度',
  `latitude` varchar(50) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '纬度',
  `address` varchar(50) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '地址',
  `create_user` bigint DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '创建者',
  `create_time` datetime DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '创建时间',
  `update_user` bigint DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '修改者',
  `update_time` datetime DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '修改时间',
  `del_flag` tinyint NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`) USING BTREE
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_general_ci COMMENT='园区表'
tb_cabinet:
CREATE TABLE `tb_cabinet` (
  `id` bigint NOT NULL,
  `number` varchar(50) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '柜号',
  `floor_id` bigint DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '所在楼层',
  `create_user` bigint DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '创建人',
  `create_time` datetime DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '创建时间',
  `update_user` bigint DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '修改人',
  `update_time` datetime DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '修改时间',
  `del_flag` tinyint DEFAULT '0',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`) USING BTREE
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_general_ci COMMENT='配电柜表'
tb_smart_manager_device:
CREATE TABLE `tb_smart_manager_device` (
  `id` bigint NOT NULL,
  `name` varchar(50) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci NOT NULL COMMENT '名称',
  `identification` varchar(50) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci NOT NULL COMMENT '设备唯一识别码',
  `model` varchar(50) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci NOT NULL COMMENT '型号',
  `number` varchar(50) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci NOT NULL COMMENT '编号',
  `floor_id` bigint NOT NULL COMMENT '所属楼层',
  `install_time` datetime NOT NULL COMMENT '安装时间',
  `create_user` bigint DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '创建人',
  `create_time` datetime DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '创建时间',
  `update_user` bigint DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '修改人',
  `update_time` datetime DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '修改时间',
  `del_flag` tinyint DEFAULT '0',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`) USING BTREE
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_general_ci COMMENT='通信机信息表'
tb_month_eus:
CREATE TABLE `tb_month_eus` (
  `id` bigint NOT NULL,
  `building_id` bigint DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '楼宇表主键',
  `total_electric_energy` decimal(10,2) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '总用电量',
  `total_power` decimal(10,2) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '总功率',
  `insert_time` datetime DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '创建时间',
  `year` int DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '年份',
  `month` int DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '月份',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`) USING BTREE
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_general_ci COMMENT='每月能耗统计'
stats_day_collect:
CREATE TABLE `stats_day_collect` (
  `id` bigint NOT NULL,
  `terminal_id` bigint DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '表计Id',
  `data` json DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '今日上报的所有能源数据，按照小时统计，JSON数组',
  `terminal_type` varchar(255) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '终端类型，如：插座、空调、照明',
  `create_time` datetime DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '创建时间',
  `cabinet_id` bigint DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '配电柜Id，保留字段',
  `loop_level` tinyint DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '回路等级',
  `stats_time` date DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '统计时间，只有date',
  `month` int DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '月份',
  `day` int DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '天',
  `floor_id` bigint DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '楼层Id',
  `update_time` datetime DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '统计时间，也就是定时任务执行时间',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`) USING BTREE
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_general_ci COMMENT='统计当天按小时汇总能耗数据'
